title: So You're Saying There's A Chance...
itunes:title: So You're Saying There's A Chance...
description:
MON 11/14 - Charlamagne bugs Envy & Angela about his 8-1 Cowboys and their chances at a Super Bowl run. Dave Chappelle said "give Trump a chance" while hosting SNL and we asked, "Should we?". Chances are you can't get a job as a meteorologist by starting forest fires (insert hee-haw here). And is there a chance that you can commit one gay act and NOT be gay? There's a chance we got this from Issa Rae's HBO show "Insecure"...

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
